channel.title: CVE Feed for helderk -- Maintenance Mode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for helderk -- Maintenance Mode

item.title: CVE-2024-1478|2024-03-05T01:55:58.867Z -- helderk -- maintenance%20mode
item.description: The Maintenance Mode plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.5.0 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to obtain post and page content via API thus bypassing the content protection provided by the plugin.

item.title: CVE-2024-32708|2024-06-04T17:50:48.932Z -- helderk -- maintenance%20mode
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in helderk Maintenance Mode allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Maintenance Mode: from n/a through 3.0.1.
